name: Eurogroup for Wildlife and Laboratory Animals
goal: EWLA is a federation of non-governmental organisations, which is committed to improving the way research animals and wild animals are treated throughout the European Union. It uses its scientific and technical expertise to advise on animal welfare issues and encourages the validation and use of alternative testing methods.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Alternatives to Animal testing
Cosmetics implementation
Biocides
Implementation of Zoo Directive
Wildlife trade
